channel.title: Method Courses for "Non-Math" Students on Sun Yufei
channel.description: Recent content in Method Courses for "Non-Math" Students on Sun Yufei

item.title: Learning R with Dr. Hu and His Friends | 计算社会科学编程语言证书项目（R语言)
item.description: I created the “Learning R with Dr. Hu and His Friends” workshop series to help students without programming background to enjoy the convenience and efficiency programming (esp. based on R) can brings to their academic lives. The workshop series include 18 episodes that covers topics from fundamental data cleaning to Bayesian analysis and machine learning. This is a year-long program and free to access by all the Tsinghua community offline and others online.
